body: The budget here is **30 mins**, which is exactly how much time will be paid for, when the task is completed
@amihaiemil this task is yours, please help (see our key [principles of work](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles)). If you have any technical questions, don't hesitate to ask right here
@amihaiemil since there is no activity in the last few days in this task I decided to ask you to let us know what's going on... How are things going?
@dmarkov well, I did it a week ago I guess, and there is a pull request for it, #113 RtCommentTest. Since then, I did indentation and code style fixes, and now I'm waiting for Yegor's next review.

issue.title: #113 RtCommentTest

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body: unit tests for the operations of RtComment

body: @amihaiemil please post your status here.. Keep in mind that every task is expected to be finished in a few days maximum.

A pull request is already created for this, I did the las change 3 days ago, and I'm waiting for notice. This is the pull request: #146 Sorry for the missleading link in my previous commend, wasn't intended :)
Today I added the repo() method to RtCommentTest, in order to refactor the tests and get rid of PMD multiple string violation. Waiting for notice.
@amihaiemil Much obliged! I've added **30 mins** to your account in payment "DA2139044"
